thread.title: Pixar releases clip from short film 'Sanjay's Super Team'
thread.title_full: Pixar releases clip from short film 'Sanjay's Super Team' - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Pixar releases clip from short film 'Sanjay's Super Team'
text:
EMERYVILLE, Calif., Oct. 16 (UPI) -- Pixar has released the first teaser trailer for its latest short film, Sanjay's Super Team , expected to show ahead of The Good Dinosaur next month.
A directorial debut of Pixar animator Sanjay Patel, the autobiographical short explores a child's fascination with superheroes in contrast with his father's dedication to his faith. The 30-second clip brings the audience inside the father-son duo's home as they begin their rituals -- Sanjay turning on the television to watch his favorite hero cartoon, and the father ringing a bell to commence Hindu prayers.
According to Buzzfeed India, the rest of the seven-minute short film, previewed for press several weeks ago, shows Sanjay re-imagining Hindu gods as super heroes. It is the first Pixar film helmed by an Indian-American director and is arguably among the first to delve so deeply into a director's own history.
 Disney to release 'The Incredibles 2' in 2019 'The Good Dinosaur' reimagines history in new trailer 'Sleepy Hollow,' 'Monsters University' to air on ABC Family's '13 Nights of Halloween'
